mapper.insert: insert into yomul_vendors(no, owner, name, category, info, tel, addr) values('V'||yomul_vendors_no_seq.nextval, #{owner}, #{name}, #{category}, #{info}, #{tel}, #{addr})
mapper.update: update yomul_vendors set withdrawal = 1 where owner = #{owner} and withdrawal = 0
update yomul_vendors set withdrawal = 0 where owner = #{owner} and withdrawal = 1
mapper.select: select count(*) from yomul_vendor_customers where vendor_no = #{no} group by vendor_no

select no, nickname, profileimg from (select rownum as rno, no, nickname, profileimg from (select m.no, m.nickname, m.profileimg from yomul_vendor_customers c, v_y_members m where c.vendor_no = #{no} and m.no = c.customer_no order by to_number(substr(m.no, 2))) where rownum <= 10 * #{page}) where rno > 10 * (#{page} - 1)
mapper.delete: delete from yomul_vendor_customers where vendor_no = #{vno} and customer_no = #{cno}
mapper.select: select no, title, content, ndate, hits, likes from (select rownum as rno, no, title, content, ndate, hits, likes from (select no, title, content, ndate, hits, likes from v_y_near_articles where vno = #{no} order by to_number(substr(no, 2)) desc) where rownum <= 10 * #{page}) where rno > 10 * (#{page} - 1)

select no, member_no, nickname, profileImg, content, hits, vdate from (select rownum as rno, no, member_no, nickname, profileImg, content, hits, vdate from (select r.no, r.member_no, m.nickname, m.profileImg, r.content, r.hits, r.vdate from yomul_vendor_reviews r, v_y_members m where r.vendor_no = #{vno} and r.member_no = m.no order by to_number(substr(r.no, 2)) desc) where rownum <= 12 * #{page}) where rno > 12 * (#{page} - 1)
select r.no, r.member_no, m.nickname, m.profileImg, r.content, r.hits, r.vdate from yomul_vendor_reviews r, v_y_members m where r.no = #{no} and r.member_no = m.no
mapper.update: update yomul_vendor_reviews set hits = hits + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, owner, name, category, info, tel, addr, news, customers, reviews from v_y_vendors where name like('%' || #{name} || '%')
